com.hybris.services.entitlements.rest.resources

Class EntitlementsResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hybris.services.entitlements.rest.resources.EntitlementsResource

  • @Produces(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Consumes(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Path(value="/grants")
public class EntitlementsResource
extends Object
    REST resource for grants.

    • Method Detail

      • createEntitlement

        @POST
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createEntitlement(@RequestBody
                                                         GrantData grantData)
        Creates a grant.
        Parameters:
        grantData - Grant object including list of conditions
        Returns:
        Same as request, but Id is added and current time assigned to grantTime if it was omitted.

      • resetConditions

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{grantId}/conditions")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response resetConditions(@PathParam(value="grantId")
                                                                                             String grantId,
                                                                                             @RequestBody
                                                                                             ListOfConditionData listOfConditionData)
        Set new conditions for existing grant.
        Parameters:
        grantId - id of grant
        listOfConditionData - new list of conditions. It will overwrite the existing one.
        Returns:
        modified grant

      • deleteConditions

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="/{grantId}/conditions/{conditionType}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteConditions(@PathParam(value="grantId")
                                                                                                                String grantId,
                                                                                                                @PathParam(value="conditionType")
                                                                                                                String conditionType)
        Remove condition of given type from existing grant.
        Parameters:
        grantId - id of grant
        conditionType - optional type of condition to remove
        Returns:
        updated grant

      • deleteConditions

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="/{grantId}/conditions")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteConditions(@PathParam(value="grantId")
                                                                                                String grantId)
        Remove conditions from existing grant.
        Parameters:
        grantId - id of grant
        Returns:
        updated grant

      • execute

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/userId/{userId}/execute")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response execute(@QueryParam(value="action")
                                                                                       String action,
                                                                                       @PathParam(value="userId")
                                                                                       String userId,
                                                                                       @QueryParam(value="entitlementType")
                                                                                       String entitlementType,
                                                                                       @DefaultValue(value="false") @QueryParam(value="details")
                                                                                       Boolean details,
                                                                                       @RequestBody
                                                                                       ListOfCriterionData listOfCriterionData)
        Checks if a user has a grant.
        Parameters:
        action - which action to perform on the grant
        userId - user id
        entitlementType - type of entitlement
        details - if grant details should be returned
        listOfCriterionData - execution criteria. Depend on set of conditions you expect to have in grants.
        Returns:
        boolean result and optional list of affected grants. If the result is false, the list contains the most suitable candidates.

      • executeMany

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/userId/{userId}/executeMany")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response executeMany(@QueryParam(value="action")
                                                                                               String action,
                                                                                               @PathParam(value="userId")
                                                                                               String userId,
                                                                                               @DefaultValue(value="false") @QueryParam(value="details")
                                                                                               Boolean details,
                                                                                               @RequestBody
                                                                                               ListOfExecuteManyData listOfExecuteManyData)
        Checks if a user has a grant.
        Parameters:
        action - which action to perform on the grant
        userId - user id
        details - if grant details should be returned
        listOfExecuteManyData - entitlement types and execution criteria for each type. The criteria on set of conditions you expect to have in grants.
        Returns:
        boolean result and optional list of affected grants for each entitlement type. For the results which are false, the lists contain the most suitable candidates.

      • getEntitlements

        @GET
 @Path(value="/userId/{userId}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getEntitlements(@PathParam(value="userId")
                                                                                       String userId,
                                                                                       @QueryParam(value="entitlementType")
                                                                                       String entitlementType,
                                                                                       @QueryParam(value="grantSource")
                                                                                       String grantSource,
                                                                                       @QueryParam(value="grantSourceId")
                                                                                       String grantSourceId)
        Get all user's grants of given entitlement type, grant source and grant source id.
        Parameters:
        userId - user id
        entitlementType - type of entitlement
        grantSource - reason of granting.
        grantSourceId - external granting event id.
        Returns:
        list of user's grants

public void revokeGrants(@PathParam(value="userId")

      • getGrantStatus

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{grantId}/status")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getGrantStatus(@PathParam(value="grantId")
                                                                                       String grantId)
        Get grant status. Status affects if grant is processed or skipped by methods executeMany(String, String, Boolean, com.hybris.services.entitlements.api.ListOfExecuteManyData) and execute(String, String, String, Boolean, com.hybris.services.entitlements.api.ListOfCriterionData).
        Parameters:
        grantId - grant id
        Returns:
        grant status

      • updateGrantStatus

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/{grantId}/status")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateGrantStatus(@PathParam(value="grantId")
                                                                                          String grantId,
                                                                                          @RequestBody
                                                                                          StatusData status)
        Update grant status. Status affects if grant is processed or skipped by methods executeMany(String, String, Boolean, com.hybris.services.entitlements.api.ListOfExecuteManyData) and execute(String, String, String, Boolean, com.hybris.services.entitlements.api.ListOfCriterionData).
        Parameters:
        grantId - grant id
        status - new status
        Returns:
        updated grant

        Get grant properties.

 @Path(value="/{grantId}/properties/{key}")

                                                                                                String grantId,
                                                                                                @PathParam(value="key")
                                                                                                String key)

        Parameters:

        key - property name
        Returns:

      • removeProperty

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="/{grantId}/properties/{key}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response removeProperty(@PathParam(value="grantId")
                                                                                                    String grantId,
                                                                                                    @PathParam(value="key")
                                                                                                    String key)
        Delete single property of a grant.
        Parameters:
        grantId - id of an existing grant
        key - property name
        Returns:
        the most recent value of the property

      • putGrantProperty

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/{grantId}/properties/{key}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response putGrantProperty(@PathParam(value="grantId")
                                                                                                   String grantId,
                                                                                                   @PathParam(value="key")
                                                                                                   String key,
                                                                                                   @RequestBody
                                                                                                   PropertyData value)
        Update custom grant property.

        To increment value of given property by specified number set relative to true. Use negative numbers for decrement. Increment/decrement works for numeric properties only.

        Parameters:
        grantId - grant id
        key - property name
        value - new value
        Returns:
        updated grant

 @Path(value="/{grantId}/properties/{key}")
